args.problem: Which pictures probably do not have their original name that the artist gave them in the database? What are they called? Include all relevant columns such as image_id, title, and any fields indicating whether the title is original or assigned.

xmode.name: text2SQL

xmode.content: Thought: The query results show 14 pictures that have been identified as "Likely descriptive/assigned" titles rather than original artist-given names. These titles are characterized by being descriptive of the content (e.g., describing the subject matter, donors, or being named after altarpieces they belong to) rather than original artistic titles. The data includes image_id, title, inception date, movement, genre, and a title_type_indicator field that marks them as likely not having their original names.

The longest descriptive title has 97 characters while the shortest has 29 characters.
